title: Token Economies: Buying Behavior in Schools
description: A 60-second lesson on Token Economies: Buying Behavior in Schools.

buildup.text: Token economies let students earn tokens exchangeable for rewards: extra recess, small prizes.

discovery.text: They work well for building initial habits and for students who lack internal motivation structures.

twist.text: Remove the tokens too abruptly and behavior often collapses backâ€”or gets worse than before.

climax.text: The best token systems fade gradually, transferring control from tokens to self-regulation.

punchline.text: External scaffolding worksâ€”if you plan to remove it.
